name: Skeppy: The Game
description:
Skeppy was having a calm day, about to troll a few players on his server, when all of a sudden, BadBoyHalo, GlitchBaldNoob, Mr. Squeegy, Astelic and Spifey came out to steal his idea! Skeppy must hold them off by shooting Diamond Pellets from his magical WorldEdit axe, and kill the clones! WASD to move, mouse to aim, Click to shoot.

Skeppy: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzMjRlKVO9XIqH_crIFpi6w
